entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
